info.name: Chronic
info.description: A topographic map made of the shortest time paths through a star field. A texture is used to produced a conservative force field. Create a 'time zero' location, and the automata propagate the shortest time path from that location through the force field.

#define B(U) texture(iChannel1,(U/R))
#define Main void mainImage(out vec4 Q, in vec2 U)
#define START  (.5*R)
